name: Promotion Class: Fury
description:
Role: Melee Control

Heavily armored and control focused, do not get near this defender of the fire.

Stat Adjustments:
Movement Control Intensity +21%
Hard Control Intensity +21%
Final Mitigation Cap +15%

Traits Granted:
Great Sword Mastery
Plate Armor Proficiency

Enhancements:
Holy Warrior: Now adds a Slow to melee attacks.
Devotion: Now cleanses crowd control effects on the Group when cast.
Divine Light: Now also inflicts Knockdown when deployed.


WARNING: Purchasing this talent promotes you to the Fury promotion class and prevents access to the Paladin and Vindicator promotion classes.
